thread.title: Ground News - SMU Falls Short in Bowl Game
thread.title_full: Ground News - SMU Falls Short in Bowl Game

author: dallasexpress.com
title: Ground News - SMU Falls Short in Bowl Game
text:
Summary by dallasexpress.com SMU’s bid for a 12th win came up short as the Mustangs fell to Boston College 23-14 in the second annual Wasabi Fenway Bowl on Thursday at Boston’s Fenway Park. In a sloppy game, Mustangs willed their way to a halftime lead, but the momentum shifted near the end of the third quarter, and Boston College used a 13-0 second half to pull out the victory and end SMU’s nine-game winning streak. Both teams struggled to find a rhythm in the first half, … Share menu More
